title: On a Mads One: Mads Pedersen Crushed the Early Calendar, but Can He Slay Van Aert, Van der Poel in Spring?
content:
Pedersen blitzed to six victories in eight race-days already this year â€“ but monument fame is all that counts as time ticks against the Dane.
